#summary TRANSIMS Version 5 Documentation

= TRANSIMS Version 5 =
May 2012

*[http://transims.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/V5Training Training Materials]* - Explanatory materials with a hands-on example

*Quick References* - In version 5, quick reference information is generated by running the program in question
with specified keys. For example, options for generating quick reference materials for TransimsNet include
the following.  In these cases, the use of a control file is optional.

||| *Command*     || *Comment*    	||
|| !TransimsNet -H ||  Shows program syntax and control ||
|| !TransimsNet -C ||  Create/update a self-documenting control file ||
|| !TransimsNet -X ||  Write an XML file with control keys ||
|| !TransimsNet -R ||  Write control keys and report names ||

The Execution Service describes the syntax for running TRANSIMS programs.  The program references describe each program.  
The file and parameter references describe the files and parameters used by the programs.

*[http://transims.googlecode.com/svn/v5/trunk/documentation/usermanuals/ExecutionService_V5.0.pdf - Execution Service]*

*[http://transims.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/V5ProgramReferences - Program References]*

*[http://transims.googlecode.com/svn/v5/trunk/documentation/usermanuals/FileReference_V5.0_R0.2.pdf - File Reference (v0.2)]*

*[http://transims.googlecode.com/svn/v5/trunk/documentation/usermanuals/ParameterReference_V5.0_R0.2.pdf - Parameter Reference (v0.2)]*
